entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 35 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 35 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
